title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 13 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 13 2022
description:
Jack Del Rio fined for being right: Check out the data on BLM vs. Jan. 6. Why won't NFL, NBA, MLB honor Sheriff's Deputy First Class Glenn Hilliard, a black police officer killed in the line of duty? Biden economic advisor Jared Bernstein: We don't pay attention to "daily wiggles" of stock market. Biden blames gas prices on Putin, shows up at WH at 12:30 after weekend in Delaware. C&B prediction on Manchin saving Dems by sinking BBB. DeSantis: Biden declared war on American energy production. C&B end the show taking calls.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
